metadata.title: CVE-2019-12107 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The upnp_event_prepare function in upnpevents.c in MiniUPnP MiniUPnPd through 2.1 allows a remote attacker to leak information from the heap due to improper validation of an snprintf return value.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

miniupnpd - 2.1-6ubuntu2
miniupnpd-iptables - 2.1-6ubuntu2
miniupnpd-nftables - 2.1-6ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: miniupnpd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1-6ubuntu2').
